scripts.build: npm run refined-github && npm run copy
scripts.refined-github: npm run refined-github:install && npm run refined-github:build && npm run refined-github:copy
scripts.refined-github:copy: cp refined-github/distribution/content.css Refined\ GitHub\ Extension/;cp refined-github/distribution/browser-polyfill.min.js Refined\ GitHub\ Extension/; cp refined-github/distribution/content.js Refined\ GitHub\ Extension/
